import re

with open\('README.md', 'r'\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)
    lines = content.split\('\\n'\)

# Get last 80 lines
last_80_lines = lines[-80:]

print\("=== COMPREHENSIVE MARKDOWN ANALYSIS \(Last 80 Lines\) ===\\n"\)

# 1. Check for unclosed bold
bold_markers = 0
for line in last_80_lines:
    bold_count = line.count\('**'\)
    if bold_count % 2 != 0:
        print\(f"⚠ Odd number of ** in line: {line}"\)
    bold_markers += bold_count

print\(f"✓ Bold markers properly paired \(total: {bold_markers}\)"\)

# 2. Check for unclosed inline code
inline_code = 0
for line in last_80_lines:
    backtick_count = line.count\('`'\)
    # Account for code fences \(```\)
    code_fence_count = line.count\('```'\)
    single_backticks = backtick_count - \(code_fence_count * 3\)
    
    if single_backticks % 2 != 0 and '```' not in line:
        print\(f"⚠ Odd number of backticks in line: {line}"\)
    inline_code += single_backticks

print\(f"✓ Inline code markers balanced"\)

# 3. Check heading levels
for i, line in enumerate\(last_80_lines, start=len\(lines\)-80\):
    if line.startswith\('##'\):
        print\(f"Line {i}: Heading: {line}"\)

# 4. Check for markdown structure consistency
print\("\\n=== Structure Check ==="\)
print\("Last 80 lines structure:"\)
section_count = 0
for i, line in enumerate\(last_80_lines, start=len\(lines\)-80\):
    if line.startswith\('##'\):
        section_count += 1
        print\(f"  Line {i}: Section: {line}"\)

# 5. Check list consistency in Troubleshooting
print\("\\n=== Troubleshooting Section Structure ==="\)
in_troubleshooting = False
list_item_count = 0
for i, line in enumerate\(last_80_lines, start=len\(lines\)-80\):
    if '## Troubleshooting' in line:
        in_troubleshooting = True
        print\(f"Line {i}: Found Troubleshooting section"\)
    elif in_troubleshooting and line.startswith\('## '\):
        in_troubleshooting = False
        print\(f"Line {i}: End of Troubleshooting, found next section: {line}"\)
        break
    elif in_troubleshooting and line.startswith\('- **'\):
        list_item_count += 1
        print\(f"  Line {i}: Troubleshooting item #{list_item_count}: {line[:50]}"\)

print\(f"\\nTotal troubleshooting items: {list_item_count}"\)

EOF)
